name: Mattermost 24h
description: Make the timestamp column just wide enough for a 24-hour clock. Requires Mattermost kompact.
additional_info:
Updated to match the Mattermost Kompact style sheet, which is required.
For best results, enable the 24-hour clock ( Mattermost: Account Settings > Display > Clock Display ).
If "Mattermost hidden time" is also installed, it will override this style.
